```{r}
#| echo: false

library(ggplot2)

insurance_data <- read.csv("insurance_data_S26.csv", header = TRUE)

cols_num <- which(sapply(insurance_data, is.numeric))

xcont <- list("age", "bmi")

cols_num <- which(sapply(insurance_data, function (x) !(is.numeric(x))))

xcat <- list("smoker", "children", "priorclaims")

# Excluded Variables: X, caseid, month, sex, region

print(xcont)
print(xcat)

for (col_name in xcont) {
  plot <- ggplot(insurance_data, aes(insurance_data[[col_name]], charges)) + 
  geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(data = insurance_data, method = "lm", color = "red") +
    labs(
    title = paste(col_name, " vs Charges"),
    x = paste(col_name),
    y = "Charges"
  )
  print(plot)
}

for (col_name in xcat) {
  plot <- ggplot(insurance_data, aes(as.factor(insurance_data[[col_name]]), charges)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
    labs(
    title = paste(col_name, " vs Charges"),
    x = paste(col_name),
    y = "Charges"
  )
  print(plot)
}

```
